title: Marketing Manager (Full-Time, Remote)
job_overview:
About the Client:
Our client is a growing business brokerage firm based in USA, helping business owners successfully sell and exit their companies. As they expand nationally, they’re building an internal marketing team and are looking for a dedicated Virtual Assistant to step into a full-time role that combines marketing operations management and executive assistant support.

What You’ll Do:
-Manage a small remote team (2–4 VAs) across creative, paid media, content, and CRM automation
-Oversee task delegation and quality via Trello, Slack, and ClickUp
-Build and refine SOPs for marketing deliverables (e.g., listing decks, ad campaigns, landing pages)
-Deliver marketing support packages to business sellers (Google profile, social, branding prep)
-Track and optimize internal ad campaigns via Go High Level
-Collaborate directly with the founder (a business broker) to drive marketing and operational scale
-Lay the foundation for future franchise-ready marketing systems

Ideal Candidate:
-3+ years in marketing ops, digital project management, or agency coordination
-Excellent written communication, team delegation, and documentation skills
-Highly self-managed — thrives with autonomy and clear KPIs
-Familiarity with Go High Level, Trello, Canva, Slack, and Google Drive
-Bonus: experience supporting service businesses, M&A, brokers, or franchise brands

Tools We Use:
-Go High Level (CRM & automations)
-Trello / ClickUp (project management)
-Canva Pro (graphics)
-Google Drive, Slack
-Meta Ads / Google Ads (run by VAs under your oversight)

What You’ll Love:
-A chance to build systems, not just maintain them
-Role can scale with company growth (team lead, director of ops, or fractional COO path)
-You’ll shape the backend marketing engine for a national brokerage and help business owners exit successfully

How to Apply: Please send an email to Upgrade to see actual info
